   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Styloglossus Feeder - styloglossus muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HM_HYG LPC.HM.HYG] -> [HumanMusclesHead styloglossus-muscle]): chewing, talking, suckling, and many other functions of tongue
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chondroglossus Feeder - chondroglossus muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HM_HYG LPC.HM.HYG] -> [HumanMusclesHead chondroglossus-muscle]): depresses tongue
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palatoglossus_muscle Feeder - palatoglossus muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HM_AMB LPC.HM.AMB] -> [HumanMusclesHead palatoglossus-muscle]): raising the back part of the tongue
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transversus_muscle Feeder - transverse muscle of tongue] ([BrainRegionLPC_HM_HYG LPC.HM.HYG] -> [HumanMusclesHead transverse-tongue-muscle]): narrows and elongates tongue

   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stylohyoid_muscle Feeder - stylohyoid muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HP_FCM LPC.HP.FCM] -> [HumanMusclesNeck stylohyoid-muscle]): draw hyoid bone backwards and elevate tongue; elevate the hyoid during swallowing
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superior_longitudinal_muscle Feeder - superior longitudinal muscle of tongue] ([BrainRegionLPC_HM_HYG LPC.HM.HYG] -> [HumanMusclesHead superior-longitudinal-muscle-tongue]): shortens, turns tip upward, turns lateral margins upward

   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digastric_muscle Feeder - digastric muscle, trigeminal] ([BrainRegionLPC_HP_PTP_TRM LPC.HP.PTP.TRM] -> [HumanMusclesNeck digastric-muscle-trigeminal]): opens the jaw when the masseter and the temporalis are relaxed

   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mylohyoid_muscle Feeder - mylohyoid muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HP_PTP_TRM LPC.HP.PTP.TRM] -> [HumanMusclesNeck mylohyoid-muscle]): raises oral cavity floor, elevates hyoid, depresses mandible

   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Levator_veli_palatini Feeder - levator veli palatini muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HM_AMB LPC.HM.AMB] -> [HumanMusclesHead levator-veli-palatini-muscle]): elevates soft palate
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tensor_veli_palatini_muscle Feeder - tensor veli palatini muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HP_PTP_TRM LPC.HP.PTP.TRM] -> [HumanMusclesHead tensor-veli-palatini-muscle]): tension of the soft palate
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buccinator_muscle Feeder - buccinator muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HP_FCM LPC.HP.FCM] -> [HumanMusclesHead buccinator-muscle]): compress the cheeks against the teeth (blowing), mastication

   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medial_pterygoid_muscle Feeder - medial pterygoid muscle] ([BrainRegionLPC_HP_PTP_TRM LPC.HP.PTP.TRM] -> [HumanMusclesHead masticatory-medial-pterygoid-muscle]): elevates mandible, closes jaw, helps lateral pterygoids in moving the jaw from side to side
